thread.title: The Identity Gap: Who You Are and Who You Want to Become
thread.title_full: The Identity Gap: Who You Are and Who You Want to Become

author: Ben Angel
title: The Identity Gap: Who You Are and Who You Want to Become
text:
The Identity Gap: Who You Are and Who You Want to Become If you're not a millionaire, then turn yourself into a person who can make a million dollars. --- Shares March 24, 2017 
In this video, Entrepreneur Network partner Ben Angel discusses the gap between who you are now and who you need to become to achieve your goals. 
There is no end goal, no finished product of who we will become when we have finally achieved everything we dreamed about. Goals are always changing, and we must always be changing to accomodate them. But, in that change and growth comes the greatest joy in life. 
Click play to learn how to find your purpose. 
Related: How to Find Your Purpose in Life 
Entrepreneur Network is a premium video network providing entertainment, education and inspiration from successful entrepreneurs and thought leaders. We provide expertise and opportunities to accelerate brand growth and effectively monetize video and audio content distributed across all digital platforms for the business genre. 
EN is partnered with hundreds of top YouTube channels in the business vertical and provides partners with distribution on Entrepreneur.com as well as our apps on Amazon Fire , Roku and Apple TV .
